sys_script_include.description:
Provide the data needed to populate the TPMG Physician Onboarding order guide. Main method is getTpoOrderGuideFieldValues, which takes the sys_id of a row from Pending Physicians, and returns an object, mapping the field names on the order guide, to the values to be populated in the fields.
Other methods may be added as needed to reformat or derive values, when the column contents are not directly usable.
sys_script_include.name: TpoOrderGuidePopulator
